channel.title: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ
channel.description: [b]Hey guys after about 3hours of my game running online it seems to go offline for no reason the cmd does reopen again like a restart but players leave because of this! does anyone know how i can make it run 24-7 [/b]

item.title: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

Is this a 317 pi I had this issue I had a crap vps. I upgraded then I had no problem.

Read full topic
item.source: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ

item.title: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:538426”]There are many possibilities on why it’s going down:
You’re computer/vps is crap and cannot run your server for long periods of time
The run.bat is trying to auto restart and is failing at life.
Poor portforwarding
and more.
I can’t think of the all.

We can’t help you with the little information you gave us[/quote]

[b]no it seems to be the eventmanager?? and maybe a restart built into the server but i cant see it in the run
and the cmd and control panel does restart after about 3hours but no idea how to fix this
the server is very laggy and not 100% stable so maybe i could update or get some help with this??

skype:haviland41 :|[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ

item.title: My Server keeps going offline after about 3hours of running READ
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There are many possibilities on why it’s going down:
You’re computer/vps is crap and cannot run your server for long periods of time
The run.bat is trying to auto restart and is failing at life.
Poor portforwarding
and more.
I can’t think of the all.

We can’t help you with the little information you gave us

Read full topic

item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

maby you have an auto re starter. i know some servers have it built in. Like rogers advanced scape.

you should check for other exes where your run.bat is because it sounds like a timer if its always 3 hours
